sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Tricks">a8c6c0be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbef</category> <github_id>97</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/97</github_url> <message>If you ever want to generate a random string in ServiceNow, you can use getSecureRandomString. ```javascript GlideSecureRandomUtil.getSecureRandomString(14); ```</message> <number>TIL0001100</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-18 07:20:09</sys_created_on> <sys_id>f0ba6cff2ffe051051dad5f62799b68b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-19 15:22:55</sys_updated_on> <title>Generate random string</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
